Description:
Detects the addition of a new user to a privileged group such as "root" or "sudo"

Author: Pawel Mazur
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Privileged User Has Been Created
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%new user%' and (log like '%gid=0%' or log like '%uid=0%' or log like '%gid=10%' or log like '%gid=27%'))
